2 ABC 3 DEF 4 GHI 5 JKL 6 MNO 7 PQRS 8 TUV 9 WXYZ

StartNum=420*(n-2)/(n-1) GiveNum=AfterGetNum/n; nextStartNum=420*(n-1)/(n-2)-GiveNum; afterGetNum=nextStartNum+GiveNum;
